interpretation: The crescent moon represents intuition, mystery, and the unseen. It reminds us to trust our inner wisdom and to embrace the unknown. This card may signify a time of reflection and introspection, or a need to tap into your subconscious mind to find answers. It can also indicate a period of transition or change, as the moon itself goes through phases of growth and transformation. Keywords associated with this card include: intuition, mystery, reflection, change, growth, transformation, subconscious, and hidden knowledge. Trust your instincts and let the energy of the crescent moon guide you towards your highest path.
